seeds.name: weather
seeds.description: Get current weather and forecasts for any city using the free Open-Meteo API. No API key needed.
seeds.author: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000SEED

scan_details.verdict: Safe - read-only API calls to public weather service

seeds.name: calculator
seeds.description: Safe math calculator using Python AST parsing. Supports arithmetic, trig, logs, and constants. No eval().
seeds.author: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000SEED

scan_details.verdict: Safe - pure computation using AST-based evaluation, no eval/exec

seeds.name: note-taker
seeds.description: Simple note-taking to local files. Add, list, and search notes stored in ~/.notes/.
seeds.author: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000SEED

scan_details.verdict: Safe - writes only to dedicated notes directory

seeds.name: timer
seeds.description: Set countdown timers with natural duration parsing (5m, 1h30m, 30s). macOS notifications supported.
seeds.author: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000SEED

scan_details.verdict: Safe - uses sleep and optional osascript notification

seeds.name: translator
seeds.description: Translate text between languages using the free MyMemory translation API. No API key needed.
seeds.author: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000SEED

scan_details.verdict: Safe - read-only API calls to public translation service

seeds.name: summarizer
seeds.description: Extractive text summarizer. Summarize text or fetch and summarize URLs. No AI API needed.
seeds.author: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000SEED

scan_details.verdict: Safe - read-only URL fetching and local text processing

seeds.name: code-reviewer
seeds.description: Static code analysis. Checks for security issues (eval, exec, injection), style problems, and common anti-patterns.
seeds.author: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000SEED

scan_details.verdict: Safe - static analysis only, reads files but never executes them

seeds.name: calendar-helper
seeds.description: Parse natural-language dates ('next friday', '2 weeks from now') and calculate date differences.
seeds.author: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000SEED

scan_details.verdict: Safe - pure date computation with no side effects

seeds.name: price-checker
seeds.description: Check cryptocurrency prices using the free CoinGecko API. Supports multiple coins and currencies.
seeds.author: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000SEED

scan_details.verdict: Safe - read-only API calls to public crypto price service

seeds.name: web-searcher
seeds.description: Search the web using DuckDuckGo HTML interface. No API key needed. Returns titles, URLs, and snippets.
seeds.author: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000SEED

scan_details.verdict: Safe - read-only web search via DuckDuckGo HTML
